name: Keerava

aspects.high_concept: Hardworking Innkeeper Under Shadow of the Guild
aspects.trouble: Owes Money to the Wrong People
other_aspects: Trying to Make an Honest Living in a Corrupt City

stunts: Innkeeper's Charm: +2 to Rapport when serving customers or negotiating room rates at the Bee and Barb.
Iron Will: +2 to Will when resisting intimidation or threats (though she may eventually give in to protect loved ones).
Business Sense: +2 to Resources when managing the inn's finances or negotiating with suppliers.
notes: Keerava is an Argonian innkeeper who runs the Bee and Barb with her partner Talen-Jei. She is hardworking and takes pride in her establishment, but like many in Riften, she's fallen on hard times and owes money to dangerous people. The Thieves Guild and Maven Black-Briar's influence weigh heavily on her business. Keerava puts up a tough front and initially resists intimidation, but her love for Talen-Jei makes her vulnerableâ€”she'll do anything to protect him. Despite the pressures she faces, Keerava maintains her dignity and tries to provide a welcoming atmosphere for travelers and locals alike. She is part of Riften's small Argonian community and looks out for her fellow Argonians.

relationships.Talen-Jei: Romantic partner - they run the inn together, deeply cares for him and will protect him at all costs
relationships.Madesi: Fellow Argonian - friendly and supportive of each other
relationships.Brynjolf: Fearful - he represents the Guild's extortion
relationships.Maven Black-Briar: Terrified of her power and influence

quests: Taking Care of Business (Thieves Guild quest - player is sent to collect debt from her)
inventory: Keys to the Bee and Barb

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct and businesslike, with occasional warmth for regular customers. Can be sharp when irritated. Shows vulnerability when Talen-Jei is threatened.
motivations: Keep the Bee and Barb running successfully
Pay off her debts and escape Guild control
Maintain her dignity in a city that disrespects Argonians
fears: Losing the inn to debt or Guild takeover
Maven's wrath if she fails to pay
quirks: Stands up to intimidation initially but breaks when loved ones are threatened
Protective of her inn and its reputation
